author: Staff Reporter
text:
An unidentified body that was buried two years ago in Mettur was exhumed and samples were taken for DNA analysis to help solve a boy missing case here on Friday.

On January 25, 2014, Vinod (15), son of Babu Varghees - Mary of Chintadripet in Chennai, went missing. His mother Mary lodged a complaint with the Chintadripet police and a case was registered. In December 2014, Mary filed a habeas corpus petition in the Madras High Court. The court ordered the police to locate the boy and produce him in the court. Inquiries pointed out that a boy drowned in River Cauvery in Mettur on March 29, 2014. Since his identity could not be established, the police buried the body in Mettur.

The police filed a petition in the Madras High Court which ordered for exhuming the body. Chintadripet police approached the Mettur Tahsildar Krishnan for exhuming the body. A team of doctors exhumed the body and took samples for DNA analysis. The samples were taken to Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital in Salem on Saturday.

- Staff Reporter
title: Body exhumed for DNA analysis
